nodes.text: A droid worked at Star Tours' Tomorrowland Starport. The droid ran on tracks, much like the model of MSE-series droids also at the starport.

Fans have nicknamed the droid "LGB" in reference to a standard acronym for Lehmann Gross Bahn, a model railroading system that is used to operate the droid in the theme park attraction Star Tours: The Adventures Continue.
